elements.text: When I add this to my code from the examples in chapter 18 it causes my code to fail when I add an event. Anybody else experience this?

text: Anybody else run into problems in Chapter 18 where we go to localhost8080/events/?categoryId=1 to try to sort our events by category? What works for me is if I remove the slash after "events" so localhost8080/events?categoryId=1 works for me but the first one does not.

elements.text: Anybody else run into problems in Chapter 18 where we go to localhost8080/events/?categoryId=1 to try to sort our events by category? What works for me is if I remove the slash after "events" so localhost8080/events?categoryId=1 works for me but the first one does not.

text: I believe Carrie answered <@U056SERBK2B>’ question about this in our last lecture. I had the same issue as well. I think she said if you add a “/“ at the start of your routing for all of your controller methods then this should fix that problem
